data.description: Creation of shortcuts for document writing
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Text::Shortcuts was picked because this is a module that allows the
    user to make shortcuts available for use in text processing. These
    aptly named "shortcuts" allow the use to expand something small like
    [r] to equal a long name, date, location, or anything of the users
    choice.

    In short, it is Text::Shortcuts because it lets one create
    shortcuts for use in text.
